actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Energy Conservation and Power.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Conservation and Power

official_title: A bill to repeal section 603 of the Public Utility Regulatory Policies Act of 1978.

summary.text: Repeals the authority of the Secretary of Energy under the Public Utility Regulatory Policies Act of 1978 to acquire rights-of-way through North Dakota, South Dakota, and Nebraska for transmission facilities for the seasonal diversity exchange of electric power to and from Canada.

titles.title: A bill to repeal section 603 of the Public Utility Regulatory Policies Act of 1978.
